description.oldValue:
,This feature will update default tag management settings in
the Teams Admin Center to include ”Team owners and members" and not just
"Team owners.” You can still update this to only "Team owners"
at the tenant level and override the default.
description.newValue: ,This feature will update default tag management settings in the Teams Admin Center to include ”Microsoft Default" along with Team owners and members" and "Team owners.” You can update this to your preferred option of "Team owners" or "Team owners and members" at the tenant level and override the default.
